text: Isiphingi sesifazane nesiphingi sesilisa bhaxabulani ngamunye wabo bobabili imivimbo eyikhulu, ningavumeli ukuthi nibe nesihe mayelana nabo bobabili esijezisweni senkolo kaMvelinqangi uma nina nikholelwa kuMvelinqangi nasosukwini lokugcina, futhi iqembu labakholwayo mabasibone isijeziso sabo bobabili
